content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Students these days are aware of the courses offered and the opportunities these courses offer. Apart from physical infrastructure and academic excellence, campus placement is also one of the significant factors that students evaluate while taking admission in any college.

Digital Consulting Pandit provides Digital Marketing Training Program. This training course is exclusively designed to equip students with the latest techniques of Digital Marketing. We conduct training based on real-time industry experience. With regular practical assignments, it helps them learn the finer points of this industry in depth.

This program will be highly beneficial to marketing students and will enhance their scope of employment in the digital marketing industry.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Benefits for Students:” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:19px|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_column_text]

  • Helps develop technical skill
  • Builds confidence among students
  • Improves knowledge about the latest digital marketing techniques
  • Hands-on training from Industry experts

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Benefits for Institutes:” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:19px|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_column_text]

  • Improves student placement rate
  • Enhances the college & industry connectivity
  • Improves reputation
  • Improves college admission rate
  • Enhances relationship building with potential recruiters.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Training Highlights:” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:19px|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_column_text]

  • Interactive session
  • Assignments
  • Live workshops
  • Learn with Industry Experts

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Related Training Courses” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:32px|text_align:center|color:%23000000|line_height:52px” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Certified course in Digital Marketing
